question:
Question: You are navigating to the vicinity of the tower crane at the construction site ahead. Thinking back on past actions and objects you have seen, what do your surroundings currently look like?  
Choice:  
A. There is a big park in front of me with many small houses in it. There are many tall buildings on my right. There is a road behind me.  
B. There are several high-rise buildings in front and on my right. Behind me is a construction site with a tower crane. There is a road and some low-rise buildings to my left.  
C. There are many low-rise buildings in front of me. Behind me is a wide field with a few scattered trees. A road runs parallel to me on the left.  
D. I am surrounded by high-rise buildings, and directly in front of me is a construction site. There is a creek to my left.  
E. There are several small shops and buildings to my left and across the street. There is a large undeveloped plot behind me with a small shed and garden. Ahead of me is a busy road.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: B; Reason: The surroundings include several high-rise buildings in front and to the right, a construction site with a tower crane behind, a road and some low-rise buildings to the left, which matches the description in option B.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 42)]
Option: B
Reason: The video shows high-rise buildings in front and to the right. Behind the camera is a construction site with a tower crane. To the left, there is a road and some low-rise buildings. This matches option B.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: B; Reason: The surroundings include several high-rise buildings in front and to the right, a construction site with a tower crane behind, a road and some low-rise buildings to the left, which matches the description in option B.
